about.title: About Me
about.description:
I am a web developer passionate about computing as a whole.
My curiosity drives me to explore various fields such as technology, artificial intelligence, and electronics.
I enjoy finding solutions to technical problems and taking on challenges.

Every day, I have the chance to work in a stimulating environment where I can apply my skills while constantly learning.
My passion for computing and technology allows me to take pleasure in creating and innovating, while enriching myself with knowledge and experiences.
My goal is to continue evolving in this fascinating field.

experience.title: Experiences
experience.description1:
Development of AI chatbots with RAG system • Prompt engineering • Scraping
LlamaIndex • Langchain • Huggingface • GPT • JS
Tools: GIT • Jira
experience.description2:
Development of a backend and a client portal PHP/Symfony • TMA and various evolutions on the OSAC.AERO site
PHP • Symfony • JS • MySQL • Jira
Tools: Docker • GIT • Mantis Bug Tracker • SonarQube
experience.description3:
Development of a backend and a client portal PHP/Symfony • Integration into a Symfony development team • TMA and ticket processing
PHP • Symfony • Twig • HTML • CSS

diplome.title: Degrees
diplome.description1:
Master MIAGE - Specialization: Data valorization and protection.
Dual competence in project management, management, and development, with expertise in data management.
diplome.description2: Acquisition of dual competence in project management and software development, preparing for technical and organizational responsibilities.
diplome.description3: Mastery of Java, C, PHP, SQL, Bash, as well as network concepts, design patterns, security, and algorithmic logic.

certification.title: Certifications
certification.description1: Comprehensive certification covering advanced topics in JavaScript.
certification.description2: Comprehensive certification covering advanced topics in Python.
certification.description3: Certification on Langchain, ChatGPT, and mastery of RAG systems.

ePortfolio.title: ePortfolio
ePortfolio.subtitle: Interactive personal portfolio
ePortfolio.description: Development of an interactive personal portfolio designed to showcase my technical skills, professional experiences, and personal projects. This project was developed with React and TypeScript.

markIA.title: MarkIA
markIA.subtitle: Technical documentation site with AI
markIA.description: Development of a web platform for writing and storing documentation integrating artificial intelligence to simplify search. The project includes a chatbot powered by a knowledge base (the documentation) and a RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) system.

jobo.title: JOBO
jobo.subtitle: Mobile app to promote industrial jobs and Made in France
jobo.description: Creation of an innovative mobile application that recognizes objects via the camera and identifies the craftsmanship or industrial jobs involved in their manufacture. Developed with React Native and an AI vision model.

meteoApp.title: MeteoApp
meteoApp.subtitle: Weather alert mobile application
meteoApp.description: A customizable application to alert users about extreme weather events in their region. Includes real-time notifications and local weather forecasts.

eMortels.title: eMortels
eMortels.subtitle: Platform for the French Academy
eMortels.description: Design and development of an educational platform to promote mastery of the French language. This project offers interactive exercises and access to linguistic resources.

discordPiBot.title: DiscordPiBot
discordPiBot.subtitle: Discord bot for home automation
discordPiBot.description: A multifunctional Discord bot hosted on a Raspberry Pi, designed to control home automation devices and automate tasks in a Discord server. Written in Python for flexible and modular GPIO port management.

enigma.title: Enigma
enigma.subtitle: University project on cryptology
enigma.description: Reproduction of the Enigma machine logic as part of a university project. This project aims to understand and implement the cryptology concepts used by the Enigma machine.

tweetLearning.title: TweetEmotion - Machine Learning
tweetLearning.subtitle: Classification of tweets by emotions using logistic regression
tweetLearning.description: Creation of a machine learning model to classify tweets based on their emotions. Preprocessing, vectorization, and supervised model training for sentiment analysis.

featureEngineering.title: LLM4FE - Feature Engineering
featureEngineering.subtitle: Automation of feature engineering with AI
featureEngineering.description: Development of a system for automating feature engineering for machine learning. Utilization of language models to generate relevant features from raw data.
